byline.contributor: Kathryn Jones contributed reporting from Stephenville, Tex.

abstract: Lawyers for Eddie Ray Routh plan to appeal his conviction in the murder of Navy SEAL Chris Kyle; will argue that Kyle's celebrity prevented Routh from receiving fair trial.
lead_paragraph: The lawyers for Eddie Ray Routh, who was sentenced to life for murdering Chris Kyle, a Navy SEAL marksman, will argue that the movie’s publicity prevented their client from getting a fair trial.

headline.main: ‘Sniper’ Case Is Headed to Appeal, Lawyers Say
headline.print_headline: ‘Sniper’ Case Is Headed to Appeal, Lawyers Say

snippet: The lawyers for Eddie Ray Routh, who was sentenced to life for murdering Chris Kyle, a Navy SEAL marksman, will argue that the movie’s publicity prevented their client from getting a fair trial.
